Load data
```{r}
# Divide up the prerecruit data
juveniles <- read.csv(here('data', 'Prerecruit_full.csv')) %>%
  filter(program == 'PRS_juveniles') # begins in 2011
larvae <- read.csv(here('data', 'Prerecruit_full.csv')) %>%
  filter(program == 'PRS_larvae') # begins in 2013

hake_subset <- juveniles[juveniles$scientific_name == "Merluccius productus", ]
  tows$lncpue <- OR_subset$lncpue_n[match_id]
  tows$lncpue[is.na(tows$lncpue)] <- 0
  selected_species <- select(tows, julian, year, lncpue, latitude, longitude, PDO, NPGO,
                             bottom_temp, depth_m, project, grain_size, area_swept)
  selected_species <- na.omit(selected_species)
  selected_species$pres <- 1 * (selected_species$lncpue > 0)



ctds <- read.csv(here('data', 'Prerecruit_env.csv'))[, -1]
```
